title: why is the new client terrible?
body: this new client has caused me to lose around about 50lp plus it half the time i am in champ select the client crashes causing me to lose lp, my computer is not the issue since i had it upgraded not 2 months ago, i just received a 30 minute ban and i am quite annoyed does anyone have any idea on why this happening and if its happening to anyone else

replies.body: I kinda have the same problem, either game freezes in champ selection or when in queue freezes and i got exit out an it causes me to leave way to many games

I find that I am lagging really bad in the new client. This is something I have never experienced with the old client.  I hear the same complaint from others within the game. I have also experienced a bug splat, again something I have never experienced.

Sorry to hear about that LP loss, that really sucks.  I want to get some more info on what's going on, but at this point you might want to stick to custom games and stop playing ranked until this is fixed.  How is the new client causing you to crash, meaning what is happening exactly?  What happens if you enable[ low-spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png)?  Are there error messages?  Get back to me so I can get a better idea of what's exactly going on.
